did.unittitle: Truman, H.S. - Correspondence - Re: Trip to Louisville, KY, at the Beginning of March - Tariff Negotiations, 28 April 1950 - Fable by Aesop Re: False Merits Re: Certain Artists - National Security, Increase the Frequency of and Preparation for Council Meetings, 19 July 1950 - Memorandum to the Secretary of Defense Re: Escorts, 1 August 1950 - "A Study of 'Witch Hunting' and Hysteria in the U.S.", Anonymous, 18 Pages - S. Res. 212 Re: Deportation of Children from Greece to Eastern Europe -Communique Re: Meeting of the President With the British Prime Minister, 6 Pages
